steps.nodeStepDescription: This weapon causes kinetic damage.
This weapon causes Void Damage.
This weapon causes Solar Damage.
This weapon causes Arc Damage.

Longest-range scope. 
Heavy optics for pinpoint sniping.

Very long distance scope.
Superb target acquisition and recoil control.

Mid-zoom precision scope. 
Increased range and target acquisition. 
Heavy.

Mid-zoom scope. 
Useful for unpredictable situations.

Agile, snappy scope.
Handles beautifully. Rewards a skilled hand.

Long-range scope. 
Excellent target acquisition. Improves weapon range.

Short-range scope. 
Quick to aim, with good range.

Low-zoom scope. 
Improved range and handling.
Increases Attack Power, allowing this weapon to cause more damage.
Bonus precision damage on last round in clip.
Kills with this weapon reduce the cooldown of your grenade.
Kills with this weapon grant bonus damage for a short time.
Reduces the severity of this weapon's recoil.
Precision kills with this weapon dramatically increase reload speed.
Missing a shot has a chance to return ammo directly to the magazine.
Optical zoom length is increased while crouched.
Shooting any type of ammo picks it up.
Kills with this weapon have the chance to grant bonus reserve ammo.
A kill with the final round in the magazine increases reload speed.
It's easier to aim under fire using this weapon.
Kills with this weapon increase reload speed for a short time.
Expect to find more ammo for this weapon. Increases carried ammo capacity.
This weapon doesn't require a full trigger pull to fire.
Reloading this weapon has a chance to grant a larger than normal magazine.
Increases the reload speed of this weapon when its mag is empty.
